fact: The First episode of “Joanie Loves Chachi” (Happy Days spinoff) was the highest rated American TV program on Korean television. “Chachi” is Korean for penis.
The real name of television’s Mister Ed was Bamboo Harvester.
The first image ever transmitted on TV was Felix the Cat.
The first toilet ever seen on television was on "Leave It To Beaver."
In every episode of Seinfeld there's a superman somewhere.
Before Late Night Television, Jay Leno appeared in an episode of Laverne and Shirley.
The characters Bert and Ernie on Sesame Street were named after Bert the cop and Ernie the taxi driver in Frank Capra's "Its A Wonderful Life" (probably apocryphal)
